mapper.select: SELECT * FROM POWER_MANUFACTURER PM JOIN POWER_CATEGORY PCA ON PM.COMPUTER_PART_IDX = PCA.COMPUTER_PART_IDX JOIN POWER_CAPACITY PCP ON PCA.COMPUTER_PART_IDX = PCP.COMPUTER_PART_IDX JOIN POWER_CERTIFICATION PCE ON PCP.COMPUTER_PART_IDX = PCE.COMPUTER_PART_IDX
SELECT POWER_IDX, POWER_TOTAL_DATA, POWER_SFILE_NAME, POWER_DEPTH, POWER_CAPACITY, COMPUTER_PART_IDX FROM POWER
